about_the_game:
After a stressful day at home, you get ready for bed, but when you wake up the next morning, you find yourself in an unfamiliar room, not recognizing your surroundings at all. "Escape from the Collector" presents an experience that combines the emotion of an escape room with the intensity of an adventure shrouded in darkness. Immerse yourself in an intriguing atmosphere where you will find yourself trapped in an old house with different levels, each filled with challenging puzzles and hidden clues. Will you have the cunning to unravel the mysteries of this house and escape the Collector's sinister game?

Exploration

  • An old house with three levels full of puzzles and mysteries.

  • Find the necessary clues scattered throughout the levels.

  • An escape room type experience: the adventure has an established order, but some of the objects you find may have to be used later on.

Puzzles

  • Each level has a main puzzle on which the rest of the mini puzzles are focused.

  • The levels have various objects that you can use.

  • Various notes and books that you can read and research.

History

  • You will have to draw your own conclusions and answers throughout the adventure.

name: Escape from the Collector Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4460k
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 780
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7-6700k
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: In "Escape from the Collector", you will be trapped in an old house full of puzzles and secrets. Explore its rooms searching clues that will guide your adventure. Each puzzle solved brings you closer to freedom or dooms you to be trapped in the Collector's sinister game. Will you be able to escape?
